item.title: Podcast Editor (Audio & Video) - Upwork
item.description:
We are a digital marketing company seeking out someone who is proficient in editing podcasts. We manage 5 podcasts currently for clients that produce 1 episode per week. This job will most likely require 25 hours of your time a week, we want to ensure whoever applies has the time to take on working with us.

Our aim is to create a long term relationship with whoever we bring on. We will continue to be bringing on more podcasts in the future which would lead to an increase in compensation.

The job responsibilities include:
- Editing the raw footage into a final version
- Mixing and mastering the audio to be clean and clear
- Adding in intros and outros to the podcast (If applicable)

Bonus Skills:
- SEO
- Thumbnail creation
- Distribution onto YouTube, Spotify, Apple

Let us know if you have any questions and we are looking forward to working with you!


Posted On: June 17, 2024 15:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For Amazon Sponsored Display Brands - Upwork
item.description:
Brief: Create a friendly but informative video for Sponsored Display Amazon ad for Buddy & Lola dog supplement brand pulling from video assets showing how to use the product.  Must be striking and scroll-stopping and feature dogs.

Key Points to Include:
Opening (5-7 seconds):
Start with an eye-catching shot of the product either pulling from how to videos customer

Overlay text: "Transform Your Dog's Digestive Health with 100% Natural Pumpkin Powder Meal Topper"

Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHw67ZJzsF8

Size: 1920x1080

Length: 20 - 30 Seconds

Must show:
The Product: www.buddyandlola.co.uk/products/pumpkin-powder (Pull render from website)
Benefits (below)
How to (below)
Buddy & Lola Logo

Examples `
https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?k=pumpkin+powder+for+dogs&crid=20HRMCNIP6BEN&sprefix=pumpkin+powder+%2Caps%2C96&ref=nb_sb_ss_pltr-sample-20_1_15


Pumpkin Powder For Dogs  Use render of products

100% Natural Pumpkin
No artificial additives, preservatives or nasties
30 Day Money Back Guarantee - Roundel on product (Supplied)
Make into a puree on your dog's lick mat or sprinkle onto your dog’s dinner

Benefits:  Lead with These on the video

Improve your dog’s digestion
Regulate your dog’s bowel movements
Eases constipation or diarrhoea
Supports gland health

How to use? Cut to a section of video showcasing how to use

Easy to use by sprinkling over food or mixing with water to make a purée

It's a gentle yet effective solution to keep your dog's digestive system running smoothly.

Suitable for dogs of ALL sizes and ages.

How to's & Video Testimonial Files supplied

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 15:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Amazon
Skills: Video Editing, Amazon
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor to create Event sizzle reels with animated graphics - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a video editor who can create high-quality Event sizzle reels with a quick turnaround time. (For example, an event might be a liquor activation at a music festival, and the video would show the booth being set up, people arriving, people trying the drinks, smiling and chatting with each other, etc.)

The ideal candidate will be skilled in:

- Video editing (both short form for social media, 30--45 seconds, and longer form for internal use, 3--5 minutes)

- Title design (using the visual identity of the brand and the brand assets provided to create titles, supers and other text overlays)
- Motion graphics (to animate the titles)

- Transitions (we like our sizzle reels to have some cool social media friendly transitions, like old film stock style, or flaring, or paper tearing -- only classy high-end modern style transitions)

- Finding music (you'll be given a brief and some samples and will need to find the right royalty-free music for the edit)

-Sound design (you may be asked to add some subtle sound effects to assist in the transitions)

- Colour correction & grading (the footage will be raw so you'll have to grade it)

- Familiarity with different aspect ratios, like 16:9, 9:16, 1:1 -- video assets may be required in multiple formats.

You will be given a script that includes a shot list, a desired order of shots, and copy for the on-screen titles / supers. A big part of the job is paying attention to detail and following the script closely.

Our turnaround times will be pretty tight; we'd like to have the rough cut 2--3 business days after you receive the footage & script, and we'd need the final edit with all graphics & colour finished 2 days after you receive feedback on the rough cut. So total turnaround is 5 days.

We commit to giving you feedback and direction quickly and understand that slow feedback on our end will result in delayed delivery times on your end.

Final delivery will be in 4K UHD (3840 x 2160).

IMPORTANT: Successful candidates will be asked to do a quick audition on some test footage to ensure you can do what you say. We will ask you to send us the Premiere Pro project back to us so we can double check the authenticity of your work. (We've had Upwork freelancers send us work samples that they didn't create in the past so we have to be careful).

Regardless, we want to see your work so please send us your best and most relevant event sizzle reel samples.

DO NOT send us any emails or phone calls to our company page; we will only consider candidates who apply on Upwork and stay within the platform.

Thank you and I look forward to seeing your submissions!



Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Video Color Correction, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Sound Design, Music & Sound Design
Skills: Color Grading, Video Color Correction, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Sound Design, Music & Sound Design
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Visualizer for Short Film - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented visualizer to work on a short film project. As the visualizer, your main responsibility will be to visualize the shots and actions of an action drama fantasy film and create a shotlist format. This is a crucial role that will help the director and cinematographer to plan and execute the film effectively. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of visual storytelling and a keen eye for detail.

  Skills:
  - Strong visual storytelling abilities
  - Proficiency in creating shotlists
  - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

  Size: Small
  Duration: Under 1 month
  Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $50

item.title: Creative Strategist - Well-paid & Long term - Upwork
item.description:
Hello !

Our company is currently looking for an additional expert in the creation of long-term Facebook Ads videos.

We already have a multi-million dollar brand and are looking to recruit new talent to create quality video ads.

Your objective will be to manage and manage the creation of Facebook Ads with an editor (who is already in our company).

You'll simply manage the strategy and directions for creating the ads. You won't need to do any editing yourself.

Your tasks will be :

- Analyze performance and iterate on formats that are already working (by analyzing ad account statistics).
- Create video scripts according to the framework we provide.
- Research and create powerful hooks (according to the framework we'll provide).
- Manage the video editor to ensure that he does exactly what you ask of him.

You'll need to be autonomous and familiar with the creation of Meta ads.

We'll provide you with ALL the instructions (via a complete and clear process) and content you need.

We're looking for a long-term, ambitious person who wants to develop within the company over the long term. If the work is of high quality, you'll be very well paid.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions, and if you think you're THE person for me and my team to work with.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:50 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Marketing Strategy, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Copywriting, Creative Brief, Creative Strategy
Skills: Marketing Strategy, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Copywriting, Creative Brief, Creative Strategy
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and bilingual Video Editor proficient in English and Spanish to join our team on a contractual basis. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing short-form content, long ads, and creating ad creatives using stock footage. This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is passionate about storytelling through video.

Key Responsibilities:

- Edit short-form content for various platforms, including social media and websites.
- Create long-form ads that effectively communicate the client's message.
- Develop engaging ad creatives and other types of content using stock footage.
- Analyze and identify the best hooks for videos to maximize viewer engagement.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the final product meets the client's expectations and brand standards.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in video editing and digital marketing.


Qualifications:

- Proficiency in both English and Spanish (spoken and written).
- Proven experience in editing short-form and long-form video content.
- Strong portfolio showcasing your ability to create compelling ad creatives and content with stock footage.
- Solid understanding of video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
- Knowledge of video production techniques and best practices.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Strong analytical skills to determine the most effective video hooks.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Creative Gadzhi style Baby Youtube Channel Video Editor V3 - Upwork
item.description:
Project Details:
Voiceover: I have a voiceover that is 6 minutes and 10 seconds long.
Script: A completed writing script is ready to accompany the voiceover.
Video Content Requirements:
Engaging Animations: I am looking for dynamic and captivating animations that align with the voiceover content, rather than relying solely on B-roll footage. Here are some animation ideas (All of these do not have to be incorprate but what ever best fit the content):
Animated Characters: Friendly characters demonstrating baby care tips and routines.
Infographic-Style Animations: Presenting important statistics, tips, and how-to guides with engaging text and icons.
Step-by-Step: Clear visuals and labels for baby care activities like diaper changing and bathing.
Interactive Q&A: Animated characters answering common viewer questions with speech bubbles and text animations.
Data or Routine Charts: Illustrating daily baby or impotant statistical data and routines with colorful charts and animations.
Gadzhi Style Editing: Incorporation of elements of the Gadzhi style to ensure the video remains lively and engaging for viewers.
Target Audience: The video should primarily focus on a female audience, particularly mothers and caregivers. The content should be relatable and visually appealing to this demographic.
Purpose: The video is intended for my baby care YouTube channel, which aims to provide valuable content to parents and caregivers in an engaging and visually appealing manner.
Length: The final video should closely match the voiceover length, approximately 6 minutes and 10 seconds.
Visual Elements: Use of soft colors, soothing backgrounds, and gentle transitions is preferred to align with the baby care theme.
Additional Details:
Revisions: I would like to include up to 3 revisions in the project scope to ensure the final video meets the desired quality and content standards.
Format: The final video should be delivered in MP4 format with a resolution of 1080p.
Style and Tone: The video should have a warm, inviting, and friendly tone. It should evoke trust and comfort, making it easy for viewers to follow along and engage with the content.
Timeline: In your reply Please provide your estimated turnaround time for this project, including initial delivery and revision periods.
Reply with the words "Happy Day" so I know you read this, thank You

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design

item.title: Creative Ad Designer for Weekly App Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone creative to help us constantly create new ad creatives for our portfolio of mobile apps across different categories.

Ideal candidate will be familiar with various AI tools to aid in creating the ads.

Must be well versed with using Facebook Ad library and TikTok Creative Center for research and must have an understanding of current marketing trends and best practices in mobile advertising .

You must have experience with mobile app add creatives specifically.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply
